name.desc: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL
name.desc_cn: 用于指定控件的名称；如果处理直接提交到URL的表单，则非常有用

size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)
size.desc_cn: 带有 CSS 单位的尺寸大小，包括单位的名称或标准大小名称（xs | sm | md | lg | xl）

model-value.desc: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive

val.desc: Works when model ('value') is Array. It tells the component which value should add/remove when ticked/unticked
val.desc_cn: 当model（'value'）是数组时工作。它告诉组件在勾选/取消勾选时应该添加/删除哪个值

true-value.desc: What model value should be considered as checked/ticked/on?
true-value.desc_cn: 什么模型值应被视为选中/勾选/启用？

false-value.desc: What model value should be considered as unchecked/unticked/off?
false-value.desc_cn: 什么模型值应被视为未选中/未勾选/关闭？

indeterminate-value.desc: What model value should be considered as 'indeterminate'?
indeterminate-value.desc_cn: 什么模型值应被视为“不确定”？

toggle-order.desc: Determines toggle order of the two states ('t' stands for state of true, 'f' for state of false); If 'toggle-indeterminate' is true, then the order is: indet -> first state -> second state -> indet (and repeat), otherwise: indet -> first state -> second state -> first state -> second state -> ...
toggle-order.desc_cn: 确定两种状态的切换顺序（“t”表示真状态，“f”表示假状态）；如果“toggle-indeterminate”为true，则顺序为：indet->first state->second state->indet（并重复），否则：indet->first state->second state->first state->second state->...

toggle-indeterminate.desc: When user clicks/taps on the component, should we toggle through the indeterminate state too?
toggle-indeterminate.desc_cn: 当用户点击组件时，我们是否也应该切换到不确定状态？

label.desc: Label to display along the component (or use the default slot instead of this prop)
examples: I agree with the Terms and Conditions
label.desc_cn: 和组件一起显示的标签（或使用默认插槽而不是此属性）

left-label.desc: Label (if any specified) should be displayed on the left side of the component
left-label.desc_cn: 标签（如有指定）应显示在组件的左侧

checked-icon.desc: The icon to be used when the model is truthy (instead of the default design)

unchecked-icon.desc: The icon to be used when the toggle is falsy (instead of the default design)

indeterminate-icon.desc: The icon to be used when the model is indeterminate (instead of the default design)

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc_cn: 组件的颜色，来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称

keep-color.desc: Should the color (if specified any) be kept when the component is unticked/ off?
keep-color.desc_cn: 当组件未勾选/关闭时，是否应保留颜色（如有规定）？

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

dense.desc_cn: 密集模式；占用更少的空间

default.desc: Default slot can be used as label, unless 'label' prop is specified; Suggestion: string
default.desc_cn: 可以用作标签的默认插槽，除非指定了“label”属性；建议：字符串

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when the component needs to change the model; Is also used by v-model
